meanings.definition: The act of performing or executing a task or action.
meanings.sent1: Her doing of the dishes was very helpful.
meanings.sent2: I saw his doing of the magic trick.
meanings.sent3: His doing of the dance was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The cat's doing of the acrobatics was impressive.
meanings.sent5: The child's doing of the painting was colorful and creative.

meanings.definition: The state of being engaged in an activity or task.
meanings.sent1: My doing of the homework kept me busy all evening.
meanings.sent2: Their doing of the project required teamwork.
meanings.sent3: The dog's doing of the chase was amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The tree's doing of providing shade is essential on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The bird's doing of building a nest was a fascinating sight.
